en-US.name: US Capitals Quiz
en-US.summary: Test your knowledge of US state capitals
en-US.description: This skill quizzes you on the capitals of US states. You can ask for the capital of a specific state or take a quiz with random states.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask US Capitals what is the capital of California
Alexa, ask US Capitals to quiz me

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Launch the skill by saying 'Alexa, open US Capitals'. You can then ask for a capital with 'what is the capital of California' or start a quiz with 'quiz me'.
